gen:link.msg:message: Gerapporteerde waarde van `TechnicalProvisions` aan het einde van de periode BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de gerapporteerde waarde van `TechnicalProvisions` aan het begin van de periode en de mutaties gedurende de periode, `TechnicalProvisionsMovement`. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsEnd')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsStart')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1PeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_TechnicalProvisionsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ProvisionsAdditions` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ProvisionsAdditions')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ProvisionsAdditions return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E1_ChildrenOfProvisionsAdditionsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`ProvisionsWithdrawals` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ProvisionsWithdrawals')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ProvisionsWithdrawals return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1E2_ChildrenOfProvisionsWithdrawalsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

`TechnicalProvisionsMovement` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_TechnicalProvisionsMovement')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_TechnicalProvisionsMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsMovementInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1E2_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsMovementDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
